title: RestA Blog
subtitle: News, events, and stories from our kitchen.

posts.title: Spring Menu 2025
posts.excerpt: Discover our new seasonal dishes featuring spring produce.
posts.body: We're excited to introduce our spring menu. Highlights include asparagus risotto, lamb with mint pesto, and rhubarb tart. All dishes use locally sourced ingredients from our partner farms.
posts.author: Chef Marco

posts.title: Wine Pairing Guide
posts.excerpt: How to pair wine with our signature dishes.
posts.body: Our sommelier shares tips: salmon pairs well with Sauvignon Blanc, beef tenderloin with Cabernet Sauvignon, and tiramisu with Moscato. Ask our staff for recommendations.
posts.author: RestA Team

posts.title: Our Commitment to Sustainable Dining
posts.excerpt: How we source and reduce waste.
posts.body: We partner with local farms, use seasonal ingredients, and compost food waste. Our seafood is sustainably sourced. We're working toward zero-waste kitchen operations by 2026.
posts.author: RestA Team
